mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OrderCart(memberId, bookId, title, publisher, inPrice, bookCount) VALUES(#{memberId},#{bookId}, #{title}, #{publisher}, #{inPrice}, #{bookCount})
mapper.update: UPDATE OrderCart SET bookCount = #{bookCount} WHERE cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM OrderCart WHERE memberId = #{memberId} and bookId = #{bookId}
